topics.body:
"@Silent_Witness":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/540f8763636872444d9a0100#post_540f8763636872444d9a0100
Listen, if anyone knows about rain, it's me.
I live in _SCOTLAND_ for crying out loud.

When Noah appeared to the Scots and warned them all of 40 days and nights of constant rain, the Scots laughed at him.
Because 40 days and nights of rain?
*THAT'S OUR SUMMER.*
topics.author: 515ddf93a4c72d8a1f000d57

!http://www.superama.com.mx/superama/images/products/img_large/0750102052606L.jpg!

This one is worth around 12 pesos, which is 1 dollar or maybe slightly less in exchange.

Because of all the rain, we just have _really_ big quicksand pits.
